text: as an injured athlete all you think
about is feeling healthy but what you
forget about is how often you feel weird
things when you're healthy but once
you've been damaged in the past now you
something literal scar tissues and you
have to find some logical progression
that gives you training wheels on until
they see a sequential Improvement but
the tricky part is not letting them back
down the stairs when the next sequence
of it causes a little bit of another
mental Scar Tissue issue to pop up
